vocabulary_sophistication.notes: Mean Age of Acquisition for English vocabulary. Higher AoA = more sophisticated vocabulary.

lexical_diversity.source: Corpus linguistics research - typical English text TTR varies by length
lexical_diversity.notes: TTR decreases with text length. MSTTR is more stable across lengths.

sentence_complexity.source: Corpus linguistics research - English sentence length norms
sentence_complexity.notes: Twitter baseline is lower due to 280-character constraint

grammatical_precision.source: Dependency parsing research - English sentence dependency depth
grammatical_precision.notes: Calibrated against spaCy dependency parsing results

correlation_coefficients.source: Research-validated correlations between linguistic features and intelligence
correlation_coefficients.notes: These coefficients determine how strongly each dimension predicts IQ

dimension_weights.source: Trained weights based on research-validated importance
dimension_weights.notes: Vocabulary weighted highest due to strongest correlation with intelligence

twitter_adjustments.source: Twitter-specific adjustments for constrained text length
twitter_adjustments.notes: Vocabulary becomes more important in short texts
